name: Dropshot - A Few Drops
description:
This is a step down from Dropshot,
Which is currently available to buy,
So download this to see if you enjoy it,
And thanks for dropping by.


• 25 Hand-Crafted levels
• Easy to learn, impossible to perfect
• Mind-Boggling and Frustrating
• Perfect for bored minds

Upgrade to Dropshot for:
• 10 New Levels instantly
• 5 New Levels added every fortnight
• Constant help and support
• No Adverts
• No In-App Purchases
• No Ball Limits
